explains: adj. （土地或气候）干燥的，干旱的；枯燥的，乏味的；不成功的，无结果的
wordGroup: arid region 干旱区域，干旱地区；干燥区
arid land n. 旱地；贫瘠地
arid climate 干旱地带；干燥气候
semi arid adj. 半干燥的

sentences.en: Many Namibians are subsistence farmers who live in the arid borderlands.
sentences.cn: 许多纳米比亚人都是自给自足的农民，居住在干旱的边境地区。

sentences.en: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was not the arid place it is now. Rather, it was warm and damp, populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.cn: 2000万年前，爱达荷州不像现在这样干旱。确切地说，它那时温暖潮湿，生长着茂密的原始森林。

sentences.en: Regularly flowing rivers and streams that originate within arid lands are known as "endogenous".
sentences.cn: 起源于干旱地区的流动性河流和溪流通常被称为“内源河流”。
